entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with a few flurries after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
